item.description: We will be playing casino games... poker, roulette, craps, blackjack. We will provide some food and beverages, you are welcome to bring a favorite snack for the evening. *If anyone has poker chips to contribute to the game-playing, please bring them. **We do have a 16-year-old cat, but she will be locked up in the upstairs bedroom when guests are here. ***Parking: only a few spots in our driveway, best bet is on Bowdoin Drive, will send more details to attendees.

group.name: The Salem Board Games Meetup Group

item.name: Casino Game Night-Haverhill
